tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am very happy with her as she is my sons paediatrician ever since he was born. Since 2.8years I have been consulting her with my son and I have always got to the point diagnosis, advice, suggestion.
Best thing I like about her is that she doesn’t recommend antibiotics not unnecessary tests. 
I am extremely happy!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Bindu since about 8months at multiple occasions. My kid recovers as soon as we visit her. Give apt suggestion n explains us in detail. She understands our panic habits n reassures us that gives so much confidence in all the situations. My kid had viral fever once, HFMD (that made me so anxious but I could handle it better with her guidance) cold cough and loose motion; in all the occasions she handled my baby tactfully. Now my kid is not at all scared of her(but makes so much fuss to go to any docs)

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The experience with the doctor was excellent, however, it was unfortunate to have to wait 20 minutes past my appointment time to be seen.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We were there to check out vaccination schedules for our 6 month old baby. She was born in Italy and had initial dose of vaccination in Italy. So we were checking out specific vaccination schedule. It is well known truth that vaccinations contain heavy metals and can cause several health disorders. When we raised this point, doctor said vaccinations are clear and has no heavy metals in it. It was so surprising *** ****** *** *** ***** **** ***** ************ Then comes the second chapter, we asked to inspect our baby and doctor was not asking us to put baby on the inspection table and check her. Instead baby was sitting in our lap and she even checked her tummy health while baby is sitting!! Unbelievable, there is no basic health concept here!!!
Later got shocked by seeing the baby food products they sell in their little pharmacy. All baby food contains animal fats and protein which is deleterious for infants!! There is no basic standard in this place. Please check every single detail before accepting anything from this clinic. We need to protect ourselves, no one else take care unfortunately not even the doctors!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My 3 month baby started crying bitterly on 14th of June '19 and we had to rush to cloud nine hospital because that's where he was born . 
Unfortunately his regular doctor********** ******* * was not available at that particular time and the only doc available was Dr. Bindu . 
She examined my baby and found nothing wrong in him physically .. suggested colic aid drops ******** ** *** *** ******** Even after administering the same , he did not stop crying . 
she made us do urine routine sample and the reports were normal . 
So we had been administering colic aid from friday(14th june) till monday(17th june)  *** ** *** ******* **** ************* * 

It was only on tuesday (18th june) i got to know he had ear infection as there was fluid coming out of his ear . 

When she checked his ear , *** ***** *** ******** ******* ** *** ** ********* ** *** *** *** said everything is fine and normal . 

Very bad on her part !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: I went with my niece to get her checked for  jaundice. The doctor has given attention to the case and provided the best consultation. I'm thankful to the Cloudnine team that you have good specialists working which devote time.
